title: Macbeth
creator_credit: Jack Gold, Shaun Sutton, Time-Life Films and BBC
brief_description: A BBC television production of William Shakespeare’s “Macbeth” featuring Nicol Williamson as Macbeth, Brenda Bruce, Eileen Way, Anne Dyson as the three witches, Mark Dignam as Duncan, James Hazeldine as Malcolm and Jane Lapotaire as Lady Macbeth. One of 37 Plays by Shakespeare to be produced by the BBC. Suitable for secondary level.
